title: Convenient German City Stay in Chic Central Cologne
description: Step into welcoming arms and relax at the freshly renovated Holiday Inn Express Cologne - Muelheim, an IHG Hotel. Home to a spacious Great Room, lobby bar and handy all-day information hub, this contemporary hotel provides guests with every comfort, meaning an easy stay in this historic city is all but guaranteed. Spend your days taking in the action of central Cologne or strolling the neighbouring, snaking Rhine riverbank.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Cologne - Muelheim, an IHG Hotel

title: Contemporary Germany Escape near Cologne Cathedral with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
description:
Towering above Cologne's buzzing Gereon neighbourhood, this design-forward hotel is a stone's throw from the city centre and main attractions. Boasting a unique circular design and funky art splashed throughout the building interior, this contemporary retreat is equal parts quirky and stylish, with its retro-futuristc theme making for a captivating stay.

With proximity to Cologne's striking Gothic Cathedral and the Romano-Germanic Museum, the city's best is within easy reach. When it's time to treat yourself, NENI restaurant serves up mouthwatering Israeli dishes, while the cool Monkey Bar is the perfect spot to unwind with a drink after days of exploration.
